[Finally Chromakey is launched! Enjoy more diverse editing experience.]

- Chromakey is easy-to-use with a color picker and a refined control bar. It's available in clip editing and PIP.
- Extra! Color eyedropper is now available in color palette of assets. The colors in the video can be reflected in the asset for more sophisticated presentation.
- Must-see assets in VLLO! Trendy assets such as stickers, subtitles, transitions, BGM, fonts, etc., have been updated this month too.

Update VLLO now to use them.
Feel free to contact us at vllo@vimosoft.com if you have any issues or questions while using it.
